trans-unit.source: Represents an individual item of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is used in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示单个数据项的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref> ，但中使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于中的选中状态时绘制控件的背景的画笔。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用于中的选中状态时绘制控件的背景画笔。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于中的选中状态时绘制控件外部边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用于中的选中状态时绘制控件外部边框的画笔。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此项将突出显示。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此项将突出显示;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否在该项上按鼠标左键或空格键。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在该项目; 按下鼠标左键或空格键否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择此项。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未选择此项;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 键提示上显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>当你按 ALT 键。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当按下快捷键提示或加速器键时调用。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含激活有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer"></xref>对于此控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件作为新自动化对等对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true` when this control gets keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>属性`true`此控件时获取键盘焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 当访问的快捷键提示或快捷键键时调用。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含激活有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> properties to `false` when this control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>属性设置为`false`此控件时失去键盘焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> properties to `false` when the mouse pointer leaves this control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>属性设置为`false`当鼠标指针离开此控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse button is pressed, it also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鼠标按钮时，它还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `false` when the left mouse button is released over this control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>属性`false`时在此控件上释放鼠标左键。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件的工具提示中显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING]1> 每个功能区控件继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示; 将改为显示标准工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
